asteroids

Class SpaceShip

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Polygon
      • asteroids.SpaceShip
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable

    public class SpaceShip
extends java.awt.Polygon
    Holds data needed for the drawing and movement of the space ship for the game.
    Version:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Casey Scarborough
    See Also:
    GameBoard, Serialized Form
